summary: A documentary on the modeling industry's 'supply chain' between Siberia, Japan, and the U.S., told through the experiences of the scouts, agencies, and a 13-year-old model.
cast: Ashley Arbaugh|Olivia Arben|Rachel Blais|Tigran Khachatrian|Nadya Vall
director: Directors: David Redmon, Ashley Sabin (as A. Sabin)
title: Girl Model
